name: Animal Adventure: Endangered
description:
A Game by Maggie Rembert!

A simple 2D game where the player must complete challenges and avoid obstacles. Elements of the game spikes, movable platforms, jumping blocks, and more. 

Explore all the reaches of earth as you play as five different animals, facing the dangers of nature and human kind. 

  • A Plains Bison, native to North American, were brought to near extinction due to colonists wiping them out to make room for farms and ranches.
  • Snow Leopard, found in the Himalayas, now considered pests by the farmers that encroach into the large cat's natural habitat.
  • Orangutan, who's Indonesian and Malaysian forests are being cut down, destroying their environment.
  •  A Tiger, whos population reaches approximately 3,900 left in the wilds of Southeast Asia. The remaining majority are now in captivity with more than 5,000 privately owned in the US alone.
  • Lastly, the Tasmanian wolf, a carnivorous marsupial that was last seen in the 1930s. From the introduction of invasive predators to being sleeked by trophy hunters, the Tasmanian wolf has now gone extinct.

The goal I had while making this game was to spread awareness of the endangerment of animals. Although some great animals no longer walk the earth, it is not to late to save some facing the same danger. It is up to us to save the earth and all of its inhabitants!
